Body:
I am trying to convert following curl command to send notification via urllib2

curl -v -S -u devuser:devuser123 -F'notification={applicationId":"4"
column11:
type:"USER"};type=application/json' -F'endpointKeyHash=lsXnYUbE31aCgN5NSsbcRMAZTgM=;type=text/plain' -F file={"message" : "Hello world!"} "http://localhost:8080/kaaAdmin/rest/api/sendUnicastNotification" | python -mjson.tool

and i write this code for send notification

import urllib2
column19:
"Basic %s" % base64string) result = urllib2.urlopen(request) the_page = result.read()

but when i run this code i encourage the following error

line 527
column24:
fp) HTTPError: HTTP Error 415: Unsupported Media Type

problem probably is about send multiple data through urllib2 but how can i send that parameters to kaa server via urllib2? thank you!

"

Body:
you need to set a content-type header as multipart/form-data for your request. That is why you get the unsupported media type" error.

"
